verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> and his household <S%H1004><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%>
Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%>
Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that came <S%H3318><s%> out of the loins <S%H3409><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were seventy <S%H7657><s%> souls: <S%H5315><s%> for Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> already.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that generation. <S%H1755><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and increased <S%H8317><s%> abundantly, <S%H8317><s%> and multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and waxed exceeding <S%H3966><s%> mighty; <S%H6105><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with them.
Now there arose <S%H6965><s%> up a new <S%H2319><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than we:

Come <S%H3051><s%> on, let us deal wisely <S%H2449><s%> with them; lest <S%H6435><s%> they multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and it come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that, when <S%H3588><s%> there falls <S%H7122><s%> out any war, <S%H4421><s%> they join <S%H3254><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to our enemies, <S%H8130><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against us, and so get <S%H5927><s%> them up out of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Therefore they did set <S%H7760><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them taskmasters <S%H8269><s%> <S%H4522><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> them with their burdens. <S%H5450><s%> And they built <S%H1129><s%> for Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> treasure <S%H4543><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> Pithom <S%H6619><s%> and Raamses. <S%H7486><s%>

But the more <S%H3651><s%> they afflicted <S%H6031><s%> them, the more <S%H3651><s%> they multiplied <S%H7235><s%> and grew. <S%H6555><s%> And they were grieved <S%H6973><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> with rigor: <S%H6531><s%>

And they made their lives <S%H2416><s%> bitter <S%H4843><s%> with hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage, <S%H5656><s%> in mortar, <S%H2563><s%> and in brick, <S%H3843><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> manner of service <S%H5656><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their service, <S%H5656><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they made them serve, <S%H5647><s%> was with rigor. <S%H6531><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> midwives, <S%H3205><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Shiphrah, <S%H8236><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Puah: <S%H6326><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> When you do the office of a midwife <S%H3205><s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women, and see <S%H7200><s%> them on the stools; <S%H70><s%> if it be a son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall kill <S%H4191><s%> him: but if <S%H518><s%> it be a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> then she shall live. <S%H2425><s%>

But the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> not as the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%> them, but saved <S%H2421><s%> the men children <S%H3206><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for the midwives, <S%H3205><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Why <S%H4069><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> and have saved <S%H2421><s%> the men children <S%H3206><s%> alive? <S%H2421><s%>

And the midwives <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women <S%H802><s%> are not as the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> women; <S%H802><s%> for they are lively, <S%H2422><s%> and are delivered <S%H3205><s%> ere <S%H2962><s%> the midwives <S%H3205><s%> come <S%H935><s%> in to them.
Therefore God <S%H430><s%> dealt well <S%H3190><s%> with the midwives: <S%H3205><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and waxed very <S%H3966><s%> mighty. <S%H6105><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, because <S%H3588><s%> the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> that he made <S%H6213><s%> them houses. <S%H1004><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> that is born <S%H3209><s%> you shall cast <S%H7993><s%> into the river, <S%H2975><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> you shall save <S%H2421><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>
